body:
Hi,  		 	   		  I need a working binary of RADIANCE 3.7 to run a simulation with Photon Map. I have been told that I should use this version because Photon Map may not be totally compatible with more recent versions of Radiance. Can someone please help me with that?Regards,Alejandro
___
